data.title: Bol Bam Song Released: Satyam Shivam Sundaram
data.meta_description: Bhola Baba's devotees have a reason to rejoice. The first Bol Bam song of this year, "Satyam Shivam Sundaram," has been released. This song is a gift for
data.text:
WhatsApp Group Join Now

Telegram Group Join Now

Image credit via youtube

Bhola Baba’s devotees have a reason to rejoice. The first Bol Bam song of this year, “Satyam Shivam Sundaram,” has been released. This song is a gift for Shiva’s followers.

Bol Bam Song Released: Satyam Shivam Sundaram

Kalpana Patowary and Mahi Srivastava have brought the first Bol Bam song of the year. This song is released worldwide by the World Wide Records company. The song is available on the official YouTube channel of World Wide Records Bhojpuri. The sacred month of Sawan is dedicated to Lord Shiva. Devotees carry Ganga water to Shiv Dham and offer it to Lord Shiva, seeking his blessings.

Captivating Devotees

This Bol Bam song is sung by Bhojpuri legend Kalpana Patowary. She has a deep devotion to Lord Shiva. Her songs have been superhits among music lovers for the past two decades. Her old hit songs about Lord Shiva are still listened to with great affection. Actress Mahi Srivastava has played a mesmerizing role in this song. She is known for her versatile acting skills. The combination of Kalpana Patowary and Mahi Srivastava has created a buzz among the audience. People are loving this song.
